Key Features:
  • Core Automation - same robotics and app-integrated sensors as Low-Effort tier.
  • AI suggested actions, but you can override for personalization (e.g., via AR tutorials).
  • Your Touch - weekly nutrient-pod refill, quick pruning, optional reseeding.
  • Effort-scaling modes let you dial automation up or down.
  • Community Hub - share recipes and trade produce with neighbors.
  • Time Needed ≈ 30 min / week
Service Model:
  • Self-assembly stackable PureLight™ units.
  • Monthly consumable deliveries (e.g., nutrient packs or juvenile crayfish).
  • Monthly virtual agronomist consultations.
